article: A goal for life Do you have a goal for life? What is it? Do you want to become a great writer, a famous singer or just become a rich person? A survey  _  that in modern society , most people choose practical  _  such as "making money to buy a house and a car," "making one's life better" or "finding a good job". Wang You  _  in a small company in Nanjing 3 years ago. The job was good and he didn't need to work on Saturday or Sunday.  _  he felt the work wasn't exciting at all and the life was  _  . So he gave up his job and went to Beijing in February, 2009. When he  _  in Beijing, he had his new goal as finding a good job. Now more and more people want to live a  _  life. This shows that the society is making progress and people's life goals have become more practical. One researcher says, "Everybody  _  his or her own life goal. If one man is poor, his life goal will be to make more money. If one man doesn't  _  a diploma , studying hard to get a diploma will become his life goal. And if one man doesn't have  _  , his life goal will be to look for smiles and kindness. If one man has no life goal, he will waste his lifetime."
